attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
please can anyone who is total against the way this goverment is telling us how and what hours we can work.
This is a free country we should work as and when we please.
The working times directive should be scrapped

rejection.details: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to... "the working times directive" does not make sense.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
